name: Free-Fi.Org
body:
### Free-Fi
**NEVER** use open unsecured Wifi
[Identity theft](https://www.fbi.gov/about-us/investigate/cyber/identity_theft) is one of the fastest growing crimes.  If you use a wireless network [WiFi](http://dilbert.com/strip/2015-06-21) that does not use a password, your private information can be stolen by anyone.

### Use a default password
Most WiFi modern networks today can offer **WPA2** security, which means that even if the password is public, then other people can not access your data. (Note: A dedicated hacker MAY be able to steal your session on initial connection, but this is still safer than NO password).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
